classification_data.text: 04/12/2019 1/1 MINISTÉRIO DA FAZENDA Secretaria da Receita Federal do Brasil Procuradoria-Geral da Fazenda Nacional CERTIDÃO NEGATIVA DE DÉBITOS RELATIVOS AOS TRIBUTOS FEDERAIS E À DÍVIDA ATIVA DA UNIÃO Nome: WELLINGTON TEIXEIRA DA SILVA EQUIPAMENTOS ELETRICOS CNPJ: 15.232.821/0001-20 Ressalvado o direito de a Fazenda Nacional cobrar e inscrever quaisquer dívidas de responsabilidade do sujeito passivo acima identificado que vierem a ser apuradas, é certificado que não constam pendências em seu nome, relativas a créditos tributários administrados pela Secretaria da Receita Federal do Brasil (RFB) e a inscrições em Dívida Ativa da União (DAU) junto à Procuradoria-Geral da Fazenda Nacional (PGFN). Esta certidão é válida para o estabelecimento matriz e suas filiais e, no caso de ente federativo, para todos os órgãos e fundos públicos da administração direta a ele vinculados. Refere-se à situação do sujeito passivo no âmbito da RFB e da PGFN e abrange inclusive as contribuições sociais previstas nas alíneas 'a' a 'd' do parágrafo único do art. 11 da Lei nº 8.212, de 24 de julho de 1991. A aceitação desta certidão está condicionada à verificação de sua autenticidade na Internet, nos endereços <http://rfb.gov.br> ou <http://www.pgfn.gov.br>. Certidão emitida gratuitamente com base na Portaria Conjunta RFB/PGFN nº 1.751, de 2/10/2014. Emitida às 11:23:59 do dia 25/11/2019 <hora e data de Brasília>. Válida até 23/05/2020. Código de controle da certidão: 8AD8.4946.FD61.1921 Qualquer rasura ou emenda invalidará este documento.

content.thinking: Let me analyze this document carefully to determine its category. 1. TEXT EXTRACTION: The document appears to be a "CERTIDÃO NEGATIVA DE DÉBITOS RELATIVOS AOS TRIBUTOS FEDERAIS E À DÍVIDA ATIVA DA UNIÃO" (Certificate of No Debts Related to Federal Taxes and the Federal Active Debt). It's issued by the "MINISTÉRIO DA FAZENDA" (Ministry of Finance), "Secretaria da Receita Federal do Brasil" (Federal Revenue Secretariat of Brazil), and "Procuradoria-Geral da Fazenda Nacional" (National Treasury Attorney General's Office). The document certifies that WELLINGTON TEIXEIRA DA SILVA EQUIPAMENTOS ELETRICOS (CNPJ: 15.232.821/0001-20) has no pending debts related to federal taxes administered by the Federal Revenue Secretariat of Brazil (RFB) and registrations in the Federal Active Debt (DAU) with the National Treasury Attorney General's Office (PGFN). The certificate is valid for the headquarters and its branches, and in the case of a federal entity, for all agencies and public funds of the direct administration linked to it. It refers to the taxpayer's situation within the scope of the RFB and PGFN and includes the social contributions provided for in items 'a' to 'd' of the sole paragraph of art. 11 of Law No. 8,212, of July 24, 1991. The certificate was issued on November 25, 2019, at 11:23:59 (Brasília time) and is valid until May 23, 2020. The control code of the certificate is 8AD8.4946.FD61.1921, and any erasure or amendment will invalidate this document. 2. PRIORITY CHECKS: - The document is not BLANK as it contains meaningful content. - It is not LINK_ONLY as the primary content is not hyperlinks/URLs. 3. ISSUER IDENTIFICATION: - The document is issued by the "MINISTÉRIO DA FAZENDA" (Ministry of Finance), "Secretaria da Receita Federal do Brasil" (Federal Revenue Secretariat of Brazil), and "Procuradoria-Geral da Fazenda Nacional" (National Treasury Attorney General's Office). - It's not issued by DIAN, Chamber of Commerce, or other specific authorities mentioned in the categories. 4. DOCUMENT FUNCTION ANALYSIS: - This is a tax compliance document certifying that a company has no tax debts. - It's not a personal identification document, corporate documentation, ownership structure document, or beneficial ownership transparency document. 5. CATEGORY CLASSIFICATION: - This document doesn't match any of the specific categories mentioned (CECRL, RUT, CERL, ACC, RUB). - It's a tax compliance certificate issued by Brazilian tax authorities. 6. CONFIDENCE VALIDATION: - The document clearly doesn't fit into any of the specific categories provided. - It's a tax clearance certificate from Brazil's tax authorities. Based on this analysis, I'll classify this document as "POR_REVISAR" since it doesn't clearly fit any of the specific categories defined.
